panels.description: Mean Score of the last 3 ML scores

targets.rawSql:
SELECT * FROM fact_mood_ml
order by inserted_at desc
LIMIT 3

panels.title: State of the Art Machine Learning for Mood Score Prediction in oneM2M

#mood #IoT #ai

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_readings AS (
  SELECT
    m.metric_id,
    f.value,
    f.inserted_at,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.metric_id ORDER BY f.inserted_at DESC) as rn
  FROM fact_telemetry f
  INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
  WHERE m.metric_id IN (35, 36, 37)
)
SELECT
  NOW() AS "time",
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_id = 35 THEN value END) AS "CO2 (ppm)",
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_id = 36 THEN value END) AS "Humidity (%)",
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_id = 37 THEN value END) AS "Temperature (°C)"
FROM latest_readings
WHERE rn = 1;

WITH latest_readings AS (
  SELECT
    m.metric_id,
    f.value,
    f.inserted_at,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.metric_id ORDER BY f.inserted_at DESC) as rn
  FROM fact_telemetry f
  INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
  WHERE m.metric_id IN (1, 2)
)
SELECT
  NOW() AS "time",
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_id = 1 THEN value END) AS "Light (lux)",
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_id = 2 THEN value END) AS "Noise Level"
FROM latest_readings
WHERE rn = 1;

WITH latest_readings AS (
  SELECT
    m.metric_id,
    f.value,
    f.inserted_at,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.metric_id ORDER BY f.inserted_at DESC) as rn
  FROM fact_telemetry f
  INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
  WHERE m.metric_id IN (1, 2)
)
SELECT
  NOW() AS "time",
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_id = 1 THEN value END) AS "Light (lux)",
  MAX(CASE WHEN metric_id = 2 THEN value END) AS "Noise Level"
FROM latest_readings
WHERE rn = 1;

SELECT
  f.inserted_at AS "time",
  MAX(CASE WHEN m.metric_id = 9 THEN f.value END) AS "Occupancy"
FROM fact_telemetry f
INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(f.inserted_at)
  AND m.metric_id = 9  -- occupancy sensor
GROUP BY f.inserted_at
ORDER BY "time" ASC;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('hour', inserted_at) + 
    INTERVAL '30 min' * FLOOR(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM inserted_at) / 30) AS "time",
  AVG(score) AS "Mood Score"
FROM fact_mood_ml
WHERE $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('hour', inserted_at) + 
    INTERVAL '30 min' * FLOOR(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM inserted_at) / 30)
ORDER BY "time" ASC;

SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  score AS "Mood Score"
FROM fact_mood_ml

ORDER BY inserted_at ASC;

SELECT
  f.inserted_at AS "time",
  f.value AS "CO2 (ppm)"
FROM fact_telemetry f
INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(f.inserted_at)
  AND m.metric_id = 35
ORDER BY "time" ASC;

SELECT
  f.inserted_at AS "time",
  f.value AS "Temperature (°C)"
FROM fact_telemetry f
INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(f.inserted_at)
  AND m.metric_id = 37
ORDER BY "time" ASC;

SELECT
  f.inserted_at AS "time",
  f.value AS "Humidity (%)"
FROM fact_telemetry f
INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(f.inserted_at)
  AND m.metric_id = 36
ORDER BY "time" ASC;

SELECT
  f.inserted_at AS "time",
  f.value AS "Light (lux)"
FROM fact_telemetry f
INNER JOIN dim_metric m ON f.metric_id = m.metric_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(f.inserted_at)
  AND m.metric_id = 1
ORDER BY "time" ASC;
